column4: torren2: add your swap to fstab, so that when you reboot its activated.
It's already there in fstab.. i didn't chaneg anything..  It was working till an hour ago
It's not there.. that's what I'm saying.. It was working before but now it's not there when I boot.. I never changed anything in my fstab
I installed uswsusp to try to get my hibernate to work... And then I did s2disk -resume_device /dev/sda4 .. that's when the swap started disappearing after boot
